document.full_text: a drug that eases symptoms of sickle cell disease in older children is safe and effective to use for babies with the blood disorder and should become the new standard of care, u.s. researchers said on thursday.
document.title: common drug helps babies with sickle cell disease
lines_and_colors: a drug that eases symptoms of sickle cell disease in older children is safe and effective to use for babies with the blood disorder and should become the new standard of care, u.s. researchers said on thursday.
